purpose: To enable the creation and management of multi-agent systems that can work collaboratively to solve complex tasks
principle: Built on a framework that leverages Python's capabilities for agent-based modeling and swarm intelligence
reusability: Designed for extensibility with a modular architecture, allowing easy integration of custom agents and APIs
limitations: Currently in alpha stage, may lack comprehensive documentation and have limited support for large-scale deployments
name: Quarm
description: An AI agent swarm framework built in Python
highlight: Facilitates the orchestration and management of AI agent swarms for complex problem-solving tasks
